#summary XXXHasChanged(...)
#labels api,0.9

*Category*:

[ModelObjectFunctions Model Object Functions]

*Description*:

Dynamic shortcut method, see [hasChanged hasChanged()] for more info. Replace `XXX` with the name of a property.

*Examples*:

{{{
<cfset member = model("member").findByKey(params.memberId)>
<cfset member.email = params.newEmail>

<cfif member.emailHasChanged()>
=
<cfif member.hasChanged(property="email")>
}}}

*Related*:

 * [hasChanged hasChanged()] (function)
 * [changedFrom changedFrom()] (function)
 * [XXXChangedFrom XXXChangedFrom()] (function)
 * [changedProperties changedProperties()] (function)
 * [allChanges allChanges()] (function)
